detailed_summary:
### Summary of Corporate Disclosure Document for Ellah Lakes Plc

#### 1. Purpose and Nature of the Disclosure
This document serves as a formal notice for the Annual General Meeting (AGM) of Ellah Lakes Plc, detailing the agenda, compliance measures due to COVID-19, and procedural guidelines for shareholders.

#### 2. Key Dates
- **AGM Date:** Friday, 11 December 2020, at 11:00 AM
- **Closure of Register of Members/Transfer Books:** From 11 November to 15 November 2020 (both dates inclusive)
- **Deadline for Proxy Submission:** Not less than 48 hours before the AGM
- **Deadline for Shareholder Questions Submission:** Not later than 7 days before the AGM (by 4 December 2020)

#### 3. Location
- **AGM Venue:** Workstation, No. 7 Ibiyinka Olorunbe Close, Victoria Island, Lagos, Nigeria

#### 4. Agenda Items for the AGM
1. To receive the audited financial statements for the year ended 31 July 2020, along with reports from the directors, auditors, and audit committee.
2. To re-elect directors retiring by rotation.
3. To appoint Mr. Charles Anajemba as a director.
4. To re-appoint Olabode Akande & Co. as the auditors.
5. To authorize the directors to fix the remuneration of auditors.
6. To elect members of the audit committee.

#### 5. Directors Mentioned
- **Current Directors:**
  - Olu Akpata
  - Frank Ellah
  - Chuka Mordi
  - Shehu Abubakar
  - Osaro Oyegun
  - Gbubemi Jakpa
  - Maxwell Oko
  - Nnenna Onyewuchi
  - Enotie Ogbebor
  - Chijioke Dozie
  - Hauwa Nuru
  - Joe Attueyi
- **Directors Retiring by Rotation:** 
  - Shehu Abubakar
  - Hauwa Nuru
  - Enotie Ogbebor

#### 6. Compliance and Proxy Information
- **COVID-19 Compliance:** The AGM will adhere to the Corporate Affairs Commission (CAC) guidelines for public companies, allowing attendance by proxy only.
- **Proxy Appointment:** Shareholders can appoint a proxy from a list of nominated proxies, which includes:
  - Mr. Chuka Mordi
  - Ms. Osaro Oyegun
  - Mr. Banji Olugbuson
  - Mr. Mena Ajakpovi
  - Bishop Goodluck Akpore
- **Proxy Form Requirements:** Must be completed, stamped by the Commissioner of Stamp Duties, and submitted to Cardinal Stone Registrars Limited at least 48 hours before the meeting.

#### 7. Online Streaming
- The AGM will be streamed live via Zoom for shareholders and stakeholders unable to attend in person. The link will be provided at least 48 hours prior to the meeting.

#### 8. Audit Committee Nominations
- Shareholders may nominate another shareholder for the audit committee, with nominations to be submitted in writing to the company secretary at least 21 days before the AGM.

#### 9. Shareholdersâ€™ Rights
- Shareholders have the right to ask questions during the AGM and may submit questions in writing to the company secretary via email (secretariat@oakelegal.com) prior to the meeting.

#### 10. Company Secretary
- **Company Secretary:** OAKE Legal

#### 11. Document Date
- **Date of Document:** 6 November 2020

This summary encapsulates all significant details from the corporate disclosure document regarding the AGM of Ellah Lakes Plc, ensuring clarity on the meeting's purpose, procedures, and compliance measures.
